entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
